citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The report of semi-annual evaluations submitted to the Institutional Official in June 2023 noted minor deficiencies
identified by the committee but did not contain a specific schedule, with dates, for correction. In order for the Institutional
Official to be able to discharge their responsibilities under the AWA, reports of semi-annual evaluations must contain a
reasonable and specific plan and schedule with dates for correcting each deficiency.
To be corrected by including the required information in all semi-annual reports submitted to the Institutional Official after
September 25th, 2023.
No regulated animals present at the time of inspection. This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility
representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The report of semi-annual evaluations submitted to the Institutional Official in June 2023 noted minor deficiencies 
identified by the committee but did not contain a specific schedule, with dates, for correction. In order for the Institutional 
Official to be able to discharge their responsibilities under the AWA, reports of semi-annual evaluations must contain a 
reasonable and specific plan and schedule with dates for correcting each deficiency. 
 
To be corrected by including the required information in all semi-annual reports submitted to the Institutional Official after 
September 25th, 2023. 
 
No regulated animals present at the time of inspection. This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility 
representative. 
 
 n
